content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help. It's great that you're taking the initiative to share a part of Japanese culture with your roommate. Remember to have fun with it and be open to feedback. Who knows, you might just introduce your roommate to a new favorite snack!

If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask. Otherwise, good luck with your onigiri-making adventure, and I hope you and your roommate enjoy the experience!
